item.title: My first post !
item.description: This is my first post using Hugo and the Blowfish theme.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I always try to find time to work and learn something new. Here are a few projects that I try to work on. The following list contains projects that I’ve worked on and that are no longer maintained as well as ongoing projects.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a PhD student in distributed systems at Sorbonne University in Paris. Prior to being a student I worked as an engineer in high-performance computing, in the fintech industry and as a research engineer at Inria (public research institute).
